dwarf_traits.title: SPEED 20 FEET (4 SQUARES)
dwarf_traits.desc: Your speed is only 20 feet, but

dwarf_traits.title: DARKVISION 60 FEET
dwarf_traits.desc: You can see in the dark up to 60 feet. This works like normal vision, but it's only in shades of gray.

dwarf_traits.title: HATRED: +1 VS GOBLINS AND ORCS
dwarf_traits.dsec: You get a +1 bonus on attack rolls against goblins an orcs because of your special training.

dwarf_traits.title: HARDY: +2 VS. POISON AND SPELLS
dwarf_traits.desc: You get a +2 bonus on saving throws to resist poison, spells, and monster abilities that imitate spells.

dwarf_traits.title: WEAPON FAMILIARITY
dwarf_traits.desc: You know how to use battleaces and warhammers, no matter what your class is.

elf_traits.title: SPEED 30 FEET (6 SQUARES)
elf_traits.desc: Your normal speed is 30 feet. When wearing medium or heavy armor, your speed is reduced to just 20 feet (4 squares)

elf_traits.title: LOW-LIGHT VISION
elf_traits.desc: You can see twice as far as in dim light as a dwarf or a human.

elf_traits.title: ELVEN SLEEP IMMUNITY
elf_traits.desc: you are immune to magic sleep attacks (like sleep spells)

elf_traits.title: KEEN SENSES
elf_traits.desc: Elves are good at spotting details. Write 2+ in the MISC MOD BOX for 'Perception Skill'

elf_traits.title: WEAPON FAMILIARITY
elf_traits.desc: You know how to use longbows, longswords, rapiers, and shortbows, no matter what your class is.

human_traits.title: SPEED 30 FEET (6 SQUARES)
human_traits.desc: Your normal speed is 30 feet. When wearing medium or heavy armor, your speed is reduced to just 20 feet (4 squares).

human_traits.title: BONUS FEAT
human_traits.desc: Humans have a knack for learning special tricks called feats. You start the game with an extra feat.

human_traits.title: BONUS SKILL RANKS
human_traits.desc: Humans learn things easily. You get an extra skill rank at every level.
